resources.string: Note: The app takes in messages in the format of tag_message. The tag field tells the app what to do and the message field will display in the message feed of the app. \n\nSimulator Visibility sets the visibility of the signal bar at the top of the app. If you need text to display at the start of a experiment set it in the start text area. Any text sent with the start tag will always be ignored. The same rules apply to the stop tag.
